title: The Edinburgh gazetteer, or geographical dictionary ...
snippet: Mordington, a parish of Scotland, inBerwickshire.

title: Miscellaneous Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott, Bart
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: " In the march between Mordington and Coppersmith(Cockburn's Path) we saw not any Scotchman in Eyton, andother places that we passed through ; but the streets were fullof Scotch women, pitiful Borrow creatures, clothed in whiteflannel, in a very homely manner.
